com.linecorp.armeria.client

Class ClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientBuilder

  • public final class ClientBuilder
extends Object
    Creates a new client that connects to the specified URI using the builder pattern. Use the factory methods in Clients if you do not have many options to override.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientBuilder(String uri)
      Creates a new ClientBuilder that builds the client that connects to the specified uri.
      ClientBuilder(URI uri)
      Creates a new ClientBuilder that builds the client that connects to the specified URI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a new client which implements the specified clientType.

      ClientBuilder      		 decorator(Class<I> requestType, Class<O> responseType, Function<T,R> decorator)
      Adds the specified decorator.
      ClientBuilder defaultResponseTimeout(Duration defaultResponseTimeout)
      Sets the default timeout of a response.

      Sets the default timeout of a response in milliseconds.

      Sets the default timeout of a socket write attempt.

      Sets the default timeout of a socket write attempt in milliseconds.

      Sets the ClientFactory of the client.

      • defaultWriteTimeoutMillis

        public ClientBuilder defaultWriteTimeoutMillis(long defaultWriteTimeoutMillis)
        Sets the default timeout of a socket write attempt in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        defaultWriteTimeoutMillis - the timeout in milliseconds. 0 disables the timeout.

      • defaultWriteTimeout

        public ClientBuilder defaultWriteTimeout(Duration defaultWriteTimeout)
        Sets the default timeout of a socket write attempt.
        Parameters:
        defaultWriteTimeout - the timeout. 0 disables the timeout.

      • defaultResponseTimeoutMillis

        public ClientBuilder defaultResponseTimeoutMillis(long defaultResponseTimeoutMillis)
        Sets the default timeout of a response in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        defaultResponseTimeoutMillis - the timeout in milliseconds. 0 disables the timeout.

        public ClientBuilder defaultResponseTimeout(Duration defaultResponseTimeout)
        Sets the default timeout of a response.
        Parameters:
        defaultResponseTimeout - the timeout. 0 disables the timeout.
